description: Shadow Copies deletion using operating systems utilities via PowerShell Author: frack113. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Legitimate Administrator deletes Shadow Copies using operating systems utilities for legitimate reason
name: Delete Volume Shadow Copies Via WMI With PowerShell
query: (process.command_line:*Get\-WmiObject* AND process.command_line:*\ Win32_Shadowcopy* AND process.command_line:(*Delete\(\)* OR *Remove\-WmiObject*))
